description:
Clean and filter sequences in genbank or fasta files

This tool provides functionality to:
- Clean sequence names for compatibility with newick format
- Deduplicate sequence names to ensure uniqueness
- Strip non-canonical residues from sequence ends
- Filter out sequences containing non-canonical residues

parameters.name: Fasta Type
parameters.help: Whether the sequences in fasta files are protein or nucleotide sequences.

parameters.name: Fasta Out
parameters.help: Makes output a fasta file when activated.

parameters.name: Clean Name
parameters.help: If true then make the name compatible with newick format.

parameters.name: Deduplicate Names
parameters.help: If true then rename sequences such that output sequences have unique names.

parameters.name: Strip
parameters.help: If true then strip non-canonical residues or amino acids from the ends of sequences (depending on input type). Including * characters.

parameters.name: Filter By amino acids / nucleotides
parameters.help: If true then throw out sequences containing non-canonical residues or amino acids (depending on input type). Including * characters. (applied after strip)
